00019 import ScheatorController.MainController;
00024 public class MainTablePanel extends AbstractView {
00025 
00026     JTable mainTable;
00027     javax.swing.JButton upButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
00028     javax.swing.JButton downButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
00029     javax.swing.JButton saveButton = new javax.swing.JButton();

00031     private javax.swing.ActionMap actionMap;

00033     public Boolean tableEdited = false;
00034     MainTableModel mainTableModel;

00036     public MainTablePanel(MainController controller) {
00037 
00038         this.controller = controller;
00039         controller.addView(this);
00040         init();
00041 
00042     }

00044     public void setTableEdited(Boolean tableEdited) {
00045         Boolean oldValue = tableEdited;
00046         this.tableEdited = tableEdited;
00047         firePropertyChange("tableEdited", oldValue, this.tableEdited);
00048     }
00049     
00050     public Boolean isTableEdited() {
00051         return tableEdited;
00052     }

00055     private void init() {
00056 
00057         javax.swing.JPanel panel = new javax.swing.JPanel();
00058         javax.swing.JPanel buttonPanel = new javax.swing.JPanel();
00059 
00060         this.resourceMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getResourceMap(MainTablePanel.class);
00061         this.actionMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getActionMap(MainTablePanel.class, this);
00062 
00063         mainTableModel = new MainTableModel(controller);
00064         mainTable = new JTable(mainTableModel);
00065 
00066         initTable(mainTable);
00067         mainTable.setFillsViewportHeight(true);
00068         JScrollPane scrollPanel = new JScrollPane(mainTable);
00069 
00070         panel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(panel, BoxLayout.X_AXIS));
00071         buttonPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(buttonPanel, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS));
00072 
00073         upButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("moveUp.text"));
00074         upButton.setName("moveUp");
00075         upButton.setAction(actionMap.get("moveUp"));
00076         upButton.addActionListener(new ButtonListener());
00077         
00078         downButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("moveDown.text"));
00079         downButton.setName("moveDown");
00080         downButton.setAction(actionMap.get("moveDown"));
00081         downButton.addActionListener(new ButtonListener());
00082 
00083         saveButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("save.text"));
00084         saveButton.setName("save");
00085         saveButton.setAction(actionMap.get("save")); // NOI18N
00086 
00087         buttonPanel.add(upButton);
00088         buttonPanel.add(downButton);
00089         buttonPanel.add(saveButton);
00090 
00091         add(scrollPanel);
00092         add(buttonPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
00093 
00094         add(panel);
00095         setName("tablePane");
00096     }
00097     private JTable initTable(JTable table) {
00098 
00099         table.setSelectionMode(ListSelectionModel.SINGLE_SELECTION);
00100         table.setColumnSelectionAllowed(false);
00101         table.setRowSelectionAllowed(true);
00102         table.setFillsViewportHeight(true);
00103         table.setDragEnabled(true);
00104         table.setShowVerticalLines(false);
00105         table.getColumnModel().getColumn(0).setPreferredWidth(5);
00106         table.getColumnModel().getColumn(1).setPreferredWidth(100);
00107         table.getColumnModel().getColumn(2).setPreferredWidth(100);
00108 
00109         return table;
00110     }

00120     public void print() {
00121         try {
00122             mainTable.print();
00123         } catch (java.awt.print.PrinterException e) {
00124             System.err.format("Cannot print %s%n", e.getMessage());
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     @Action (enabledProperty = "tableEdited")
00129     public void save() {
00130         controller.scheduleEdited();
00131         setTableEdited(false);
00132     }
00133 
00134     @Action
00135     public void moveUp() {
00136         Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00137         if (row > 0) {
00138             controller.moveMatch(row, row - 1);
00139             setTableEdited(true);
00140         }
00141     }
00142 
00143     @Action
00144     public void moveDown() {
00145         Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00146         if (row < mainTable.getRowCount()-1) {
00147             controller.moveMatch(row, row + 1);
00148             setTableEdited(true);
00149         }
00150 }
00151 
00152     class ButtonListener implements ActionListener {
00153         ButtonListener() {
00154 
00155         }
00156         public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00157             if (e.getActionCommand().equals("Up")) {
00158                 Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00159                 if (row > 0) {
00160                     mainTableModel.moveMatch(row, row - 1);
00161                     setTableEdited(true);
00162                 }
00163             }
00164             else if (e.getActionCommand().equals("Down")) {
00165                 Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00166                 if (row < mainTable.getRowCount()-1) {
00167                     mainTableModel.moveMatch(row, row + 1);
00168                     setTableEdited(true);
00169                 }
00170             }
00171             else if (e.getActionCommand().equals("Save")) {
00172                 mainTableModel.save();
00173             }
00174         }
00175     }

00179         String source = e.getSource().getClass().getName();
00180         System.err.println("comboBoxEvent source: " + source);
00181     }
